sentences.sContent: All my friends do not smoke.
sentences.sCn: 我的朋友并不全都吸烟。

sentences.sContent: Then you must be my cousin.
sentences.sCn: 那么你一定是我的远亲了。

sentences.sContent: ...But my grandmother was a terror for that kind of thing...
...and my wife spent the whole time worrying about bats getting into her hair...
...and I'd like to recommend your hotel to my friends and colleagues...
...He knew my love for yoga and had seen a space close to where he lived that he thought might be good to serve as a yoga studio...
...which is still in good condition so far without any mechanical breakdowns or potential problems due to my careful maintenance...
...1 felt powerful because 1 broke through my own limitations...
...having a moment of clarity right then and there: Yoga is saving my life...
...you could also visit me at my dorm: 101Room at Dorm 1...
...I remember sitting on a bench with my aunt at a yoga studio...
